name: Google
description: The world's most popular search engine that provides personalized search results, images, videos, maps, news, and more.

name: GitHub
description: A platform for version control and collaboration. GitHub lets developers work together on projects from anywhere in the world.

name: Stack Overflow
description: A public Q&A site for programmers. Find solutions to coding problems and share knowledge with a community of developers.

name: MDN Web Docs
description: Comprehensive documentation for web developers. Includes detailed information on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Web APIs.

name: Figma
description: A collaborative interface design tool that's available in the browser. Create, test, and share designs with your team.

name: ChatGPT
description: An AI language model that can assist with writing, coding, learning, and more through natural conversation.

name: YouTube
description: The world's largest video-sharing platform where you can discover, watch and share videos on any topic.

name: Notion
description: An all-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, wikis, and databases. Organize your work and life in one flexible tool.

name: Product Hunt
description: A platform to discover the latest mobile apps, websites, and technology products. Find daily features and trending tech.

name: Trello
description: A visual tool for organizing your work and life. Trello's boards, lists, and cards help teams manage projects collaboratively.
